definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_ticks</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="86" w="233">This example will test if the entity is holding a specific item. If it is true, then it will give the entity a level 2 status effect of speed for 3 seconds.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_has_item_inventory"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Namalonblade</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">CUSTOM:Anemiapotion</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">400</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">120</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_deal_custom_damage"><value name="damage_number"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_health"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="localization_text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Стал жертвой анемии (как он это вообще сделал?)</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
